definitions.definition: A dressing made from vegetable oil , raw egg yolks , vinegar or lemon juice , and seasoning , used on salads , with french fries , in sandwiches etc .
Any cold dish with that dressing as an ingredient.
examples: We served a lobster mayonnaise as a starter.

definitions.definition: Any cream, for example for moisturizing the face or conditioning the hair , for which the base is egg yolks and oil.

main_definition: A dressing made from vegetable oil , raw egg yolks , vinegar or lemon juice , and seasoning , used on salads , with french fries , in sandwiches etc .
secondary_definitions: Any cold dish with that dressing as an ingredient.
Any cream, for example for moisturizing the face or conditioning the hair , for which the base is egg yolks and oil.
